channel.title: CVE Feed for SWARCO -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SWARCO -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-12493|2024-09-17T01:16:45.556Z -- swarco -- cpu%20ls4000
item.description: An open port used for debugging in SWARCOs CPU LS4000 Series with versions starting with G4... grants root access to the device without access control via network. A malicious user could use this vulnerability to get access to the device and disturb operations with connected devices.
